      static boolean SUPPORT_DATA_STORAGE
      Support saving binary data automatically to a generated storage.data file.
      static boolean SUPPORT_DEFAULT_FONT
      Default font is loaded on window initialization to be available for the user to render simple text NOTE: If enabled, uses external module functions to load default raylib font
      static boolean SUPPORT_EVENTS_AUTOMATION 
      static boolean SUPPORT_EVENTS_WAITING
      Wait for events passively (sleeping while no events) instead of polling them actively every frame
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_BMP 
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_FLAC
      Support .flac to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_FNT
      Selected .fnt to be supported for loading

      Select .gltf to be supported for loading

      Select .iqm to be supported for loading

      Support .mp3 to be supported for loading

      Select .mtl to be supported for loading

      Select .obj to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_OGG
      Support .ogg to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PIC 
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PNG 
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_PSD 
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_TGA 
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_TTF
      Selected .ttf to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_VOX
      Select .vox to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_WAV
      Support .wav to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FILEFORMAT_XM
      Support .xm to be supported for loading
      static boolean SUPPORT_FONT_TEXTURE
      Draw rectangle rShapes using font texture white character instead of default white texture Allows drawing rectangles and text with a single draw call, very useful for GUI systems!
      static boolean SUPPORT_GIF_RECORDING
      Allow automatic gif recording of current screen pressing CTRL+F12, defined in KeyCallback()
      static boolean SUPPORT_GL_DETAILS_INFO 
      static boolean SUPPORT_HALFBUSY_WAIT_LOOP
      Use a half-busy wait loop, in this case frame sleeps for some time and runs a busy-wait-loop at the end
      static boolean SUPPORT_IMAGE_EXPORT
      Support image export functionality (.png, .bmp, .tga, .jpg)
      static boolean SUPPORT_IMAGE_GENERATION
      Support procedural image generation functionality (gradient, spot, perlin-noise, cellular)
      static boolean SUPPORT_IMAGE_MANIPULATION
      Support multiple image editing functions to scale, adjust colors, flip, draw on images, crop...
      static boolean SUPPORT_MESH_GENERATION
      Support procedural mesh generation functions, uses external par_shapes.h library NOTE: Some generated meshes DO NOT include generated texture coordinates
      static boolean SUPPORT_MOUSE_CURSOR_POINT
      Draw a mouse pointer on screen
      static boolean SUPPORT_QUADS_DRAW_MODE
      Use QUADS instead of TRIANGLES for drawing when possible Some lines-based rShapes could still use lines
      static boolean SUPPORT_SCREEN_CAPTURE
      Allow automatic screen capture of current screen pressing F12, defined in KeyCallback()
      static boolean SUPPORT_STANDARD_FILEIO
      Support standard file IO functions in utils.File.java
      static boolean SUPPORT_TEXT_MANIPULATION
      Support text management functions If not defined, still some functions are supported: TextLength(), TextFormat()
      static boolean SUPPORT_TRACELOG
      Show TRACELOG() output messages
      static boolean SUPPORT_TRACELOG_DEBUG
      Show LOG_DEFAULT output messages NOTE: By default LOG_DEBUG traces not shown
      static boolean SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR
      Support VR simulation functionality (stereo rendering)
      static boolean SUPPORT_WINMM_HIGHRES_TIMER
      Use busy wait loop for timing sync, if not defined, a high-resolution timer is setup and used

        public static boolean SUPPORT_FONT_TEXTURE
        Draw rectangle rShapes using font texture white character instead of default white texture Allows drawing rectangles and text with a single draw call, very useful for GUI systems!

      • SUPPORT_IMAGE_MANIPULATION

        public static boolean SUPPORT_IMAGE_MANIPULATION
        Support multiple image editing functions to scale, adjust colors, flip, draw on images, crop... If not defined, still some functions are supported: ImageFormat(), ImageCrop(), ImageToPOT()

      • SUPPORT_DEFAULT_FONT

        public static boolean SUPPORT_DEFAULT_FONT
        Default font is loaded on window initialization to be available for the user to render simple text NOTE: If enabled, uses external module functions to load default raylib font
